scripts.test: npm run lint && sh -c 'set -e; files=$(find . -path "./node_modules" -prune -o \( -name "*.test.js" -o -name "*.test.ts" -o -name "*.test.tsx" \) -print); if [ -z "$files" ]; then echo "No activities tests found"; exit 0; fi; node --import tsx --test --import ../scripts/jsx-loader-register.mjs $files'
